source:
%%sql
-- Build comment_type_reference_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

-- CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW structure_reasoning_detail_reference_dim_new

--     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.id IS NULL
        THEN T3.ServiceDataID
        ELSE NULL
    END AS ServiceDataID, -- surrogate key
   
    T3.salutation AS Salutation,
    T3.firstname AS FirstName,
    T3.lastname AS LastName,
    T3.address1 AS AddressLine1,
    T3.address2 AS AddressLine2,
    T3.city AS AddressTown,
    T3.counrt AS AddressCounty,
    T3.postode AS Postcode,
    T3.country AS AddressCountry,
    T3.organisationname AS Organisation,
    T3.organisationtypename OrganisationType,
    T3.Role,
    T3.telephoneoffice AS TelephoneNumber,
    T3.telephonemonile AS OtherPhoneNumber,
    T3.fax AS FaxNumber,
    T3.email AS EmailAddress,
    T3.WebAddress,
    T3.ServiceUserType,


    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat( IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), IFNULL(T1.value,'.'))) AS RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.id = T3.StructureReasoningDetailID AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), IFNULL(T1.value,'.'))) <> T3.RowID
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.StructureReasoningDetailID IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.id IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData,
    T3.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM structure_reasoning_detail_reference_grouped T1

LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Checkmark" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_standerdised_db.horizon_service_user T3 ON T1.id = T3.StructureReasoningDetailID and T3.IsActive = 'Y'



WHERE
    (-- flags new data        
        (CASE
            WHEN T1.ID = T3.StructureReasoningDetailID AND md5(concat( IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), IFNULL(T1.value,'.'))) <> T3.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.StructureReasoningDetailID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        -- flags deleted data
        (CASE
            WHEN T1.id IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
    )
